get.description: Get all events, ordered by the most recent events first. Maximum pageSize is 1000.

delete.description:
Returns 204 No Content if the resource was deleted successfully.
Returns 404 Not Found if the resource to delete does not exist.

post.description:
Creates a `PriceCurve` event in the system using the given parameters.
The event will be sent to all webhooks that subscribe to the given type of event.

- If the `targets` parameter is not specified, simulated resources and locations will be targeted instead if any exist.

- If the `priceArea` parameter is not specified, a random price area will be selected.

- If the `priceCurveDelta` parameter is not specified, a random price curve delta will be created.

Creates a `UserEligibility` event in the system using the given parameters.
The event will be sent to all webhooks that subscribe to the given type of event.

This event does not affect the eligibility of any users. It is only used to simulate the event.

For actual events, you can call the /users/eligible endpoint to check
which users are eligible.

Creates a `LocationLPC` event in the system using the given parameters.
The event will be sent to all webhooks that subscribe to the given type of event.

- If the `locations` parameter is not specified, random locations will be targeted if any exist.

- If the `points` parameter is not specified, a random points array with maximum power will be generated.

Creates a `ResourceLPC` event in the system using the given parameters.
The event will be sent to all webhooks that subscribe to the given type of event.

- If the `resources` parameter is not specified, random resources at locations will be targeted if any exist.

- If the `points` parameter is not specified, a random points array with maximum power will be generated.
Creates simulated data with users, vehicles, locations and resources.

delete.description: Deletes all simulation data from the system. This includes users, vehicles, locations and resources.

get.description: Get all users. Maximum pageSize is 1000.

delete.description:
Returns 204 No Content if the user was deleted successfully.
Returns 404 Not Found if the user to delete does not exist.

get.summary: Get User Location By Location Id

delete.description:
Returns 204 No Content if the location was deleted successfully.
Returns 404 Not Found if the location to delete does not exist.

post.description:
Create multiple locations for several users at once.
"The request body should be an array of objects, each containing a user id and a create location request.

get.description: Get all resources registered to a user. Returns both location bound resources and vehicles.
Get all resources registered at a location.

post.description: Create a resource at a location.

get.description:
Get a user's enrollment status.
Also returns when the user was enrolled.

post.description: Enroll a user into the SPARK Program

delete.description: Remove a user from the SPARK Program

get.description: Check if a user is eligible for the SPARK Program
Get all users who are eligible for the SPARK Program. Maximum pageSize is 1000.

get.summary: Will fetch the total compensation per location the user has for the current month
Check if MeterPoint id eligible for Spark
get.description: Indicates whether or not the given MeterPoint is currently eligible for the Spark program

delete.description:
Returns 204 No Content if the webhook was deleted successfully.
Returns 404 Not Found if the webhook to delete does not exist.

patch.summary: Update individual fields of a Webhook

get.summary: Get a webhook notification log by notification id

Bearer.description: Enter the JWT-token. Bearer will be prepended.
